Sept. 17, 1904 D Pentre Contest
Pentre Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
pentre-contest
None
Gems of Sir Henry Bishop
Ynys Field, Ton, Pentre Promoted by Cory band. Prizes - 1st £7, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. Best trombone and euphonium - Cwmparc. Best cornet - Mountain Ash. 3 bands competed.
Sept. 3, 2018, 3:42 p.m. Sept. 3, 2018, 3:55 p.m.
1 Cwmparc J. C. Taylor
2 Deri Henry Bentley
3 Mountain Ash Hibernian William Breese
